description: THE BARRACKS Horse-hung Private Arpad Miklos is rubbing one out over a 'girlie' magazine when Private D'Macho comes in and checks out his meat. Both men agree that Private Miklos needs someplace to put his monster-sized tool and check out the ass of bunkmate Private Browning. Browning takes his position between the two muscle-men and begins to service them. Ass-hound Miklos puts both men on their knees and takes turns tasting their fox holes. Finally Miklos stands up and drills both men with his hard-as-steel torpedo. Eventually Private Browning ends up back in the middle, this time with Private D'Macho drilling his hole while Private Miklos feeds his face. The two tops switch places and Miklos shoots all over Browning's stomach while D'Macho coats Browning's face in sticky goo.
title: Private Lowlife, Scene #04
